name: AstridDAO
description: $ATID is the protocol token of AstridDAO, the decentralized money market and issuer of the Polkadot-native, multi-collateral stablecoin $BAI. Users can lock $ATID and generate the voting escrow $ATID token, $veATID, to boost farming rewards, share protocol revenues, earn staking rewards, vote on new collaterals and etc.
